title: Leonard Ellerbe | Ep 91 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Leonard Ellerbe | Ep 91 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
CEO of Mayweather Promotions, Leonard Ellerbe, joins the boys on a special fight week edition of ALL THE SMOKE as they talk about the upcoming Gervonta Davis fight vs. Mario Barrios. Plus, Ellerbe talks Mayweather vs. Paul.
